product_name: The North Face Mountain View Triclimate 3-in-1 Jacket - Girls'
long_description: The North Face Mountain View Triclimate 3-in-1 jacket will keep girls warm and dry this winter with comfortable, waterproof protection from the elements. Shell jacket and insulating fleece liner jacket can be worn together for the ultimate in waterproof warmth, or either piece can be worn solo as weather warrants. HyVent(R) polyester shell is constructed with a waterproof, breathable coating for dry comfort. Fully sealed seams boost weatherproofness. Removable fleece liner jacket inside shell adds warmth without too much bulkiness; liner jacket attaches to shell jacket through zip-in and snap-in compatibility. ID label helps ensure her jacket won't get lost at ski school; key clip and secure internal pocket keep her organized. Drawcord hem and rip-and-stick adjustable cuffs keep cold air and wet snow out while retaining valuable heat. Fixed hood and zippered handwarmer pockets keep key areas cozy. Liner jacket in The North Face Mountain View Triclimate girls' jacket features dual hand pockets.
